artist: Artist: Jorga Cardin , et al.; Author: Sophie D. Lux , et al.; Publisher: Public Illumination Magazine, Castel Ritaldi, Italy
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical text and illustration of nine floating faces, printed in offset lithography on coated paper covers; 23 pp.
title: Public Illumination Magazine, no. 56: Lethargy
